text: Lassina Zerbo (born 10 October 1963) is a Burkinabé politician and scientist. He became the Prime Minister of Burkina Faso on 10 December 2021. Before, he was the Executive Secretary of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty Organization. His term ended when the government was dissolved during the January 2022 Burkina Faso coup d'état. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Africa ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Burkina Faso Category:Burkinabé scientists
title: Lassina Zerbo
